App_name: Which friend will hold your hand forever?
Result: Ever thought of that one person likely to cling onto your hand forever? Take this quiz to figure out who among your friends will never let go of yours!
Result_share: You can never go wrong with Makavana! You're inseparable, and no one can ever break your bond. Some people may even think of you as siblings!
sub_desc: Spread the news! Why not SHARE this with your friends and family?
meta-d: Find out which friend of yours will always offer a helping hand!
